meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>black</kanji> <kanji>tide</kanji> isn't what you think, most likely. This is the <vocabulary>Japan current</vocabulary>, aka the <vocabulary>Kuroshio Current</vocabulary>. It's a Northern flowing  current on the West side of the Pacific Ocean. Have you heard of the Gulf Stream? It's kind of like that.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi readings of the two kanji, put together. 黒 and 潮.
